meanings.definition: Preventing food from sticking to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The antistick pan made cooking eggs so easy.
meanings.sent2: The new antistick coating on the frying pan worked perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The antistick plate was so helpful that even the cheese didn't stick.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to problem-solving was like an antistick mindset, nothing could hold her back.
meanings.sent5: The antistick surface was like a magic shield against sticky situations.

meanings.definition: A substance or coating that prevents sticking.
meanings.sent1: The chef used an antistick spray on the baking sheet.
meanings.sent2: The antistick on the spatula made flipping pancakes a breeze.
meanings.sent3: The antistick on the shoes made them slide around like ice skates.
meanings.sent4: The antistick was like a superhero power, making everything slide off effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The antistick substance was a lifesaver in the kitchen, making cleanup a snap.

meanings.sent1: The antistick fabric of the apron repelled all stains.
meanings.sent2: The antistick surface of the table made cleaning up spills simple.
meanings.sent3: The antistick gloves were like a shield against glue.
meanings.sent4: His antistick attitude towards criticism helped him stay positive.
meanings.sent5: The antistick material was like a force field against adhesives.
